A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: While better upon second showing glaring plot holes and impossible last-minute saves let down the 8th movie of the star wars trilogy. The character assassination of a well loved character is perhaps the worst aspect of the movie. \"Let the Past Die\" is the theme of the movie- apparently disparaging the original series for something new. Nothing can \"ruin\" Star Wars however what is currently being showed in theaters only has the facade of the epic fantasy rather than the heart of it.
